title: Tesla to recall nearly 55,000 Model X vehicles over brake fluid detection issue

title: Tesla Secures Title Sponsorship for Pwn2Own Automotive, Event Co-Hosted by VicOne to Uncover Vulnerabilities in Connected-Car Technologies
text: DALLAS & TOKYO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--VicOne, an automotive cybersecurity solutions leader, today announced it is co-hosting the first-ever Pwn2Own Automotive 2024 contest, the world's only event of its kind to focus on uncovering and rectifying vulnerabilities in technologies for connected cars. Tesla is Pwn2Own Automotive's title sponsor. Pwn2Own Automotive is scheduled for Jan. 24-26, 2024, at Automotive World in Tokyo. title: Tesla recalls nearly 55,000 Model X vehicles, auto regulator says
